snippet: A French motorcyclist was in critical condition after being found unconscious in remote sand dunes during the Dakar Rally in San Juan, Argentina.
lead_paragraph: A French motorcyclist was in critical condition after being found unconscious in remote sand dunes during the Dakar Rally in San Juan, Argentina.

headline.main: Dakar Rally Motorcyclist Is Found Unconscious
headline.print_headline: Dakar Rally Motorcyclist Is Found Unconscious
